_sText:
Open weapon_vendingmachine.vmf with the Hammer editing tool


Weapon Vending Machines

Instructions:

If you want to change the weapon from the default AK i put in there, then do this...

Select Entity

Change it to the weapon you want "example: weapon_scout"

Put the model inside the vending machine as shown with the AK

Name it to: weapon

***IMPORTANT*** YOU MUST CHANGE THE NAME TO WEAPON
OR VENDING MACHINE WILL NOT WORK...

Now just press the button :)

Have Fun!!! :)

Open weapon_vendingmachine.vmf with the Hammer editing tool
